ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Crowd Control
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think it s worse than that. Whoever came up with the concept of how the bard worked in EQ is gone and they have no design doc to work from, and no one
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Sep 12/00, "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...> wrote:
>.... Either that, or the person they originally
> had design the Bard has left and nobody knows how he coded it or such :)
>

I think it's worse than that. Whoever came up with the concept of how
the bard worked in EQ is gone and they have no design doc to work from,
and no one left there has a clue what the intent and vision was for the
class.

I don't see any other explanation for the past 2 years. Even the lack of
bard songs past 20 in beta 4 makes me think that no one thought out the
bard's role past that level very seriously.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
